document.full_text: concerns about the security of japanese nuclear plants from terrorist attacks were rebuffed by local officials at least once, according to classified state department cables made available by wikileaks.
document.title: japan's nuclear sites raised u.s. concerns, cables show
lines_and_colors: concerns about the security of japanese nuclear plants from terrorist attacks were rebuffed by local officials at least once, according to classified state department cables made available by wikileaks.
